subtitle: Pizza base mix is made up and filled with cod, tomato and cheese. Served hot or cold.

method.text: Place the cod in steamer over a pan of simmering water. Cover and cook for 5 min or until fish flakes easily. Remove from pan. Remove any bones. Flake the fish.
Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion, garlic and celery. Fry for 3 min or until softened. Add the bacon and cook for 2 min. Stir the tomatoes and tomato puree into the pan. Simmer for 5 min.
Make the pizza dough according to pack instructions. Divide dough into portions. Knead on a lightly floured surface until smooth.
Roll out each piece and cut each into a 18 cm round. Mix the flaked fish into the tomato mixture. Divide between the pizza rounds - spooning onto one half of each round only.
Sprinkle over 75 g of the cheese. Brush the edge with the beaten egg and the other half over to enclose the filling. Flute the edges to seal. Transfer to a lightly greased baking tray.
Brush the tops with remaining beaten egg. Sprinkle over remaining cheese. Sprinkle with black pepper.
Place in the oven for 15-20 min or until firm and golden. Serve hot or cold.

title: Calzone pizza crescents with cod
